actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to release a covenant contained in a deed conveying certain real property to Argyle Southern Co., a Delaware corporation.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of General Services to release a particular covenant contained in a deed conveying certain real property to a certain corporation.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to release a covenant contained in a deed conveying certain real property to Argyle Southern Co., a Delaware corporation.
